title: Eric
description: "Years ago we had a foreign exchange student come to live with us. We found it very difficult to pronounce his name correctly, but he didn't mind. He told us to just call him 'Eric'." As charming as he is curious, by the end of his stay this intriguing house guest will capture your heart. This story is from Shaun Tan's award-winning collection Tales from Outer Suburbia.
author: Shaun Tan
